name: Ikatuga
description:
A two-player co-op arcade shoot-em-up. Each player is equipped with a shield that protects them from either physical or energy damage. Players must coordinate to destroy enemies, and swap shields when necessary, all while outrunning a deadly blastwave. 

STORY -- After infiltrating the deadly enemy star base, Lola De Nova and Nan Ramstar detonated their dark energy bomb and unleash a cataclysmic explosion. Now their only mission is to escape the deadly blastwave alive.

CONTROLS:
Player 1: 
- W A S D to move
- Left Control to shoot
- Left Shift to swap shield
Player 2: 
- I J K L to move
- Space to shoot
- Right Control to swap shield

OR

- Any XInput controller: Left Stick to move, A to fire, B to swap shield

System and Programming by Lucas Cardoso

Art and Music by William Workman

Music created with Soundtrap.com
